actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should take such actions as are necessary to obtain the repayment by the Soviet Union in gold bars of the remainder of its World War II debt to the United States.

summary.text: Urges the President to take the necessary actions to obtain the repayment in gold bars of the remainder of the Soviet Union's World War II debt to the United States.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should take such actions as are necessary to obtain the repayment by the Soviet Union in gold bars of the remainder of its World War II debt to the United States.
